beers.description: HopHands, our precious pale ale, conditioned with coconut nectar and Tahitian vanilla beans and double dry hopped with Mosaic.
beers.summary: HopHands, our precious pale ale, conditioned with coconut nectar and Tahitian vanilla beans and double dry hopped with Mosaic.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #21. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, chardonnay, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of grapefruit pith, Beddia pizza crust, orange marmalade, and wildflower honey.
beers.description: Farmhouse IPA 6.2% Brewed with our dear friend Ilya entirely with German Pilsner malt. Hopped in the kettle with a plethora of hand selected German hops. Fermented with a magickal mixed culture then dry hopped aggressively with Crystal, Hallertau Blanc, and Hallertau Mittlefruh.
beers.summary:
Farmhouse IPA 6.2% Brewed with our dear friend Ilya entirely with German Pilsner malt. Hopped in the kettle with a plethora of hand selected German hops. Fermented with a magickal mixed culture then dry hopped aggressively with Crystal, Hallertau Blanc, and Hallertau Mittlefruh.
Notes of grapefruit pith, Beddia pizza crust, orange marmalade, and wildflower honey.

beers.notes: Notes of black cherry seltzer, kiwi berry, marigold, and strawberry jam.
beers.description: Ardmore Berry Grisette. 4.7% Brewed with Pilsner malt and raw wheat. Assertively hopped with Columbus and Spalt Select, then fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast. Conditioned on cherries, juneberries and white mulberries that were all foraged right here in Ardmore.
beers.summary:
Ardmore Berry Grisette. 4.7% Brewed with Pilsner malt and raw wheat. Assertively hopped with Columbus and Spalt Select, then fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast. Conditioned on cherries, juneberries and white mulberries that were all foraged right here in Ardmore.
Notes of black cherry seltzer, kiwi berry, marigold, and strawberry jam.

beers.notes: Notes of watermelon slushie, lush greenery, tangerine pith, and cotton candy.
beers.description: Wet Hopped IPA. 6.2% Brewed with pillowy oats and crystal malt. Aggressively hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe and a dash of Melba. Wet hopped with heaps of freshly picked whole cone Cascade grown by our friends Sunny Brae Hops as well as Kurps finest estate grown wet hops.
beers.summary:
Wet Hopped IPA. 6.2% Brewed with pillowy oats and crystal malt. Aggressively hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe and a dash of Melba. Wet hopped with heaps of freshly picked whole cone Cascade grown by our friends Sunny Brae Hops as well as Kurps finest estate grown wet hops.
Notes of watermelon slushie, lush greenery, tangerine pith, and cotton candy.

beers.notes: Notes of U-Pick farm fields, fruit leather, underripe blueberry, fresh berry jam.
beers.description: Strawberry Table Bier. 4.9% Brewed with spelt and lightly hopped with Idaho7. Conditioned for many moons on heaps of house made strawberry puree.
beers.summary:
Strawberry Table Bier. 4.9% Brewed with spelt and lightly hopped with Idaho7. Conditioned for many moons on heaps of house made strawberry puree.
Notes of U-Pick farm fields, fruit leather, underripe blueberry, fresh berry jam.

beers.notes: Notes of celery soda, lemon peel, barnyard, lime juice, and a summer garden.
beers.description: Spiced Saison. 4.5% Brewed with wheat and spiced with pink peppercorn, curry powder, and lovage. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Spiced Saison. 4.5% Brewed with wheat and spiced with pink peppercorn, curry powder, and lovage. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast.
Notes of celery soda, lemon peel, barnyard, lime juice, and a summer garden.

beers.notes: Notes of Willamette Pinot Noir, summer fruit tart, and blackcap raspberry.
beers.description: Blueberry Saison 6.2% Brewed with Pilsner malt, lemon juice, and sea salt. Gently hopped with Callista. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast then conditioned for many moons on heaps of freshly picked local blueberries.
beers.summary:
Blueberry Saison 6.2% Brewed with Pilsner malt, lemon juice, and sea salt. Gently hopped with Callista. Fermented with our Magickal Saison yeast then conditioned for many moons on heaps of freshly picked local blueberries.
Notes of Willamette Pinot Noir, summer fruit tart, and blackcap raspberry.
